title: I received a mystery gift but...
body: ...but the little message that popped up just said that I received a mystery gift and when I went to click on it, it just disappeared. How do I open gifts?

replies.body:
Once you click on the notification it should pop up letting you know what you were sent, and the notification was probably hiding in the notification window. You should be able to click on the little bell in the upper right-hand corner to open that window up to see what you got (it's just under the 'x' to close League). 

Spoiler Alert: You were gifted Corsair Quinn ^_^
awww thanks! I love HYPERSPEED Quinn
